amendment.description: Amendment added Malawi, Swaziland and Lesotho to the list of new "focus" countries proposed to be added in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-562 to add Malawi, Swaziland and Lesotho to the list of new `focus' countries proposed to be added in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum (MN) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
